attributes.action: Stop putting the price of fuel up any higher
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fuel is currently £5 a gallon. This has to STOP. Please sign this petition to make this government aware the people will not tolerate this any longer while they and the oil companies make huge profits.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
